@graph.name: WF2_Discovery-Workflow
@graph.description:
Discovery workflow with SG/PS and MaxQuant to generate microbial peptides

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Clinical Metaproteomics 2: Discovery](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/proteomics/tutorials/clinical-mp-2-discovery/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
